name: Archers Legacy Free Android Game
description:
Join the adventure and help Archer to defeat the fearsome Shadow Archer.

Archers Legacy contains 3 game modes which are:
Story Mode: Enjoy playing 20 missions with a lot of action and challenges and also lots of different environments to explore
Impossible mode: Play again the story mode only that this time you only have one chance to complete it. In this game mode you progress wont be save and if you complete it you will unlock two new costumes for the survival mode
Survival mode: Test your skills with a lot of challenges in which you can unlock new characters and alternative costumes 

The game features:
. Story mode with more than 20 missions
. Lot of environments to explore
. Try until 3 different game modes
.Fight with a lot of bosses in intense battles
.Unlock until 9 characters and a lot of alternative costumes
.Tests your skills with the survival mode

Notes:
.The survival mode and impossible mode will be unlock if you complete the story mode.
.If you want to know how to unlock a character or costume visit the unlockables section in the main menu.
.If you want to change the language go to settings > language
